statements: SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claim_date, settlement_amount FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claimant_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, settlement_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE settlement_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE settlement_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT claimant_name, settlement_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31'
SELECT claimant_name FROM insurance_claims WHERE settlement_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY settlement_amount DESC, claim_date ASC
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claim_date FROM insurance_claims WHERE claimant_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT * FROM Liability_Insurance_Claims;
SELECT claim_id, policy_holder_name, claim_date FROM Liability_Insurance_Claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, policy_holder_name, settlement_amount FROM Liability_Insurance_Claims WHERE settlement_amount > 5000;
SELECT claim_id, policy_holder_name, claim_date, settlement_amount FROM Liability_Insurance_Claims WHERE policy_holder_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT claim_id, policy_holder_name, settlement_amount FROM Liability_Insurance_Claims WHERE claim_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Liability_Insurance_Claims;
SELECT claim_id, policy_holder_name, claim_date FROM Liability_Insurance_Claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, settlement_amount FROM Liability_Insurance_Claims WHERE settlement_amount > 5000;
SELECT claim_id, settlement_amount FROM Settlement_Records WHERE settlement_status = 'Pending' AND settlement_amount <= 10000 ORDER BY settlement_amount DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, settlement_amount FROM Liability_Insurance_Claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM liability_insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, settlement_amount FROM liability_insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, settlement_amount FROM liability_insurance_claims WHERE settlement_amount > 5000;
SELECT company_name, headquarters_address FROM insurance_company WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT name, address, phone_number FROM policy_holder ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM liability_insurance_claims WHERE settlement_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder.name, policy_holder.address, insurance_company.company_name FROM policy_holder JOIN insurance_company ON policy_holder.policy_holder_id = insurance_company.company_id;
SELECT policy_number, claim_date, settlement_amount FROM liability_insurance_claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY claim_date ASC;

SELECT policy_holder.name, insurance_company.contact_email FROM policy_holder JOIN insurance_company ON policy_holder.policy_holder_id = insurance_company.company_id WHERE insurance_company.company_id = 1;
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_date, settlement_amount FROM liability_insurance_claims WHERE policy_number LIKE '%ABC%' ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM liability_insurance_claims;
SELECT policy_number, claim_date FROM liability_insurance_claims WHERE settlement_amount > 5000;
SELECT company_name, contact_person FROM insurance_companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM policyholders WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT adjuster_id, name, hire_date FROM adjusters WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM policyholders WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT id, policy_number, claim_date, settlement_amount FROM liability_insurance_claims WHERE settlement_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM insurance_companies WHERE company_name = 'ABC Insurance';
SELECT adjuster_id, name, hire_date FROM adjusters ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_companies;
SELECT company_name FROM insurance_companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_type, policy_amount FROM insurance_policies WHERE company_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT company_id, company_name FROM insurance_companies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, policy_amount FROM insurance_policies WHERE company_id = 2;
SELECT insurance_claims.claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount, policy_type FROM insurance_claims JOIN insurance_policies ON insurance_claims.policy_id = insurance_policies.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM claim_report WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT insurance_policies.policy_type, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM insurance_claims JOIN insurance_policies ON insurance_claims.policy_id = insurance_policies.policy_id GROUP BY insurance_policies.policy_type ORDER BY total_claim_amount DESC;
